projects.title: Swapi API
projects.description: While working on this app, I was able to learn how API's work behind the scenes; sending requests to API, authenticating, and testing for errors on Postman. It was interesting to see the work involved through accessing organized data from an independent third party source. On this project, I also learned the most important aspects of app development; an app's functionality in solving problems, and the pleasant user experience (UI) it provides.
tags: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, JSON, API, Postman

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: The Expense Tracker app is my introduction to React, which reinforced JavaScript concepts.This app is created to track expenses and stay on budget. It adds the expense detail, which includes, pre set payment type, store, date, purchase-item and amount. There is a delete feature and total expense to help track expenses and saty on budget. I found the component sectioning of React was easy to follow and work with.

projects.title: Calculator App
projects.description: This app is a basic calculator, which performs simple mathematical operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Working on this app was facinating and challenging at the same time.
